ygData.subject: Re: Jewelcraft...skill at 200
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail! I d like to share with you my doubts of the advantage of a high wisdom while making jewelry.  I realize I m going against everything that GZ/Verant has
ygData.messageBody:
Hail!

I'd like to share with you my doubts of the advantage of a high wisdom while making jewelry. I realize I'm going against everything that GZ/Verant has said about how wisdom helps with success at jewelry, but here goes anyways...

I am a level 36 gnomish enchanter on Rallos Zek. Currently my jewelcraft skill is 184, and it has cost me a great deal MORE than 4K plat to get here.... I think I've spent 4K in the last several weeks alone, and I've been jewelcrafting since about level 10. Being a gnome, I have a relatively low wisdom (82 buffed with my +wis jewelry) and of the 6 platinum ruby vails I have attempted, I've made 4. I have a relatively good success rate with platinum, even with such a low wisdom. Since I am still learning the skill and desperately trying to reach 200, my INT is always at my maximum 175, dex is about 106, and charisma a healthy 130ish. I have a much higher success rate than a high elf friend of mine who regularily has his WIS enhanced to around 132. we have compared successes with several platinum items, and my successes are generally greater than his.

I suspect that other stats are involved. Perhaps our combat skills somehow enter into the picture, as mine are all capped for my level, or near the cap. I am not sure but I AM sure that I am either extremely lucky with platinum (and I dont mean to be bragging at ALL). Anyone with other ideas about why this could be should share their ideas.

I have also yet to fail any metal with black pearl, and I have made MANY BP items...
----- Original Message -----
From: Danny Devorkin
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2000 10:07 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Jewelcraft...skill at 200


From: "Danny Devorkin" <devo@...>


Just wanted to tell all you want to be Jewelers a bit.

I am a level 34 Enchanter on Bristlebane Server. Name is Aeramus Brainblaster

I recently got my skill to 200....yes, it took me over 4000pp to do it too.
now, at skill 200 you should be able to make everything...or so you would think.....i am letting you know that no Plat items are tivial, nor are they easy to make.
I was lucky enough to run a GM quest which rewarded me 25 Black Pearls. now, a plat BP ring usually sells for about 1000pp. from my 25 black pearls i have made 10 rings....and had 12 failures.....
i gave some to my Guild cause they helped with the GM quest. so i have 6 left in my INV.
i have tried to make 6 Platinum Ruby veils, which usually sell for 900pp, and from the 6, i succeeded in making 2! i kept one for me, and i also made myself 2 Jasper plat rings, wis plus6

for those who dont know, Wisdom helps in success rate of jewelcraft, so, i just upped my WIS 19 points for jewelcraft, and all the stats above are with that boost and my success rate is not good. it makes my WIS 126.

I just wanted to let you guys know a bit about jewelcrafting, if you have any questions, feel free to reply.

Its hard to sell to people, when they want a plat item, and you tell them there is a chance there will be a failure.......took me a while to figure out what to say to get them to trust me.


-Aeramus Brainblaster
Bristlebaine server.
